derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from late Latin, diminutive of Latin baculus 'stick'

entry.def: A bacillus is any bacterium that has a long, thin shape.

means.word_mean: 1. aerobic rod-shaped spore-producing bacterium; often occurring in chainlike formations; found primarily in soil
